enable.fieldDescription: Check this to display My Account.
enable.name: ./myaccount/enabled

pagetitle.fieldDescription: Enter the title for My account link in header
pagetitle.name: ./myaccount/headerTitle

mydealslink.fieldDescription: Enter the GWC MyDeals page link to redirect upon click of set preferred location in restaurant locator
mydealslink.name: ./myaccount/mydealslink

rememberlabel.fieldDescription: Enter the title for Remember me
rememberlabel.name: ./myaccount/remembermeText

welcomenote.fieldDescription: Message to show the user after successful login
welcomenote.name: ./myaccount/welcomeTitle

ecpccpsyncerror.fieldLabel: Error Message When user id is present
ecpccpsyncerror.name: ./myaccount/ecpccpsyncerror

channels.fieldDescription: To add additional links in Myaccount Popup
channels.name: ./myaccount/additionalLinks

popupsignintitle.fieldDescription: Please provide the title which will appear on Sign-In component (Popup).

emailsigninpalceholder.fieldDescription: Please provide Email Placeholder for Signin.
emailsigninpalceholder.name: ./myaccount/emailSigninPlaceholder

passwordsigninplaceholder.fieldDescription: Please provide Password Placeholder for SignIn.
passwordsigninplaceholder.name: ./myaccount/passwordSigninPlaceholder

target.fieldDescription: Check to load page in a new window

prevtext.fieldDescription: Enter the text to show as 'previous' in slider

nexttext.fieldDescription: Enter the text to show as 'next' in slider

pausetext.fieldDescription: Enter the text to show as 'pause' in slider
pausetext.name: ./adagenerictexts/pausetext

clicktoplaytext.fieldDescription: Enter the aria-label text to show as 'click to play' in slider
clicktoplaytext.name: ./adagenerictexts/clicktoplaytext

clicktopausetext.fieldDescription: Enter the aria-label text to show as 'click to pause' in slider
clicktopausetext.name: ./adagenerictexts/clicktopausetext

sliderplayingtext.fieldDescription: Enter the aria-label text to show as 'slider playing' in slider
sliderplayingtext.name: ./adagenerictexts/sliderplayingtext

sliderpausedtext.fieldDescription: Enter the aria-label text to show as 'slider paused' in slider
sliderpausedtext.name: ./adagenerictexts/sliderpausedtext

activeslidetext.fieldDescription: Enter the aria-label text to show as 'active slide' in slider
activeslidetext.name: ./adagenerictexts/activeslidetext

gotoslidetext.fieldDescription: Enter the aria-label text to show as 'go to slide' in slider

visitprevslidetext.fieldDescription: Enter the aria-label text to show as 'visit previous slide' in slider

visitnextslidetext.fieldDescription: Enter the aria-label text to show as 'visit next slide' in slider
visitnextslidetext.name: ./adagenerictexts/visitnextslidetext

expandedtext.fieldDescription: Enter the aria-label text to show as 'expanded'
expandedtext.name: ./adagenerictexts/expandedtext

collapsedtext.fieldDescription: Enter the aria-label text to show as 'collapsed'
collapsedtext.name: ./adagenerictexts/collapsedtext

selectedtext.fieldDescription: Enter the aria-label text to show as 'selected'
selectedtext.name: ./adagenerictexts/selectedtext

clicktoplayvideotext.fieldDescription: Enter the aria-label text to show as 'click to play this video'
clicktoplayvideotext.name: ./adagenerictexts/clicktoplayvideotext

monthDetails.fieldDescription: Enter month names from January to December
monthDetails.name: ./adagenerictexts/monthList

enable.fieldDescription: Check this to show Join link in Header
enable.name: ./joinlinktitle/enabled

pagetitle.fieldDescription: Enter the title for join link in header
pagetitle.name: ./joinlinktitle/text

joinPagePath.fieldDescription: Page with the Newsletter Subscription component on it.
joinPagePath.name: ./joinlinktitle/pagePath

enable.fieldDescription: Check this to show Locate link in Header
enable.name: ./rl/enabled

nearestRestaurantButtonText.fieldDescription: Enter text to display on button to locate me
nearestRestaurantButtonText.name: ./rl/locateMe

radiusNearestLocation.fieldDescription: Enter the radius for Nearest Location search.
radiusNearestLocation.name: ./rl/radiusNearestLocation

maxResults.fieldDescription: Recommended maximum number of restaurants to search (upto 75)
maxResults.name: ./rl/maxResults

selectLocationBelow.fieldDescription: Please select a location below(for disambiguity) label
selectLocationBelow.name: ./rl/selectLocationBelow

searchBoxDefaultText.fieldLabel: Default Text to show in search box
searchBoxDefaultText.name: ./rl/searchBoxDefaultText

todayrestauranthours.fieldLabel: Default Text for Today's Restaurant Hours
todayrestauranthours.name: ./rl/todayrestauranthours

showCustomerFriendlyText.fieldDescription: Check this to show customer friendly text below restaurant address.
showCustomerFriendlyText.name: ./rl/showCustomerFriendlyText

arialabelforradius.fieldLabel: Aria Label for distance radius button
arialabelforradius.name: ./rl/arialabelforradius

target.fieldDescription: Check to make the Service as Filter

countryLatitude.fieldLabel: Latitude value for Contact us RL page
countryLatitude.name: ./rl/latitudeRL

countryLongitude.fieldLabel: Longitude value for Contact us RL page
countryLongitude.name: ./rl/longitudeRL

restaurantNumberText.fieldDescription: restaurant Number Text for Push pins
restaurantNumberText.name: ./rl/restaurantNumberText

resultMessage.fieldDescription: Use annotations as described below: {0} - Total results
resultMessage.name: ./rl/resultMessage

emptySearchErrorText.defaultValue: Please enter a zip code or city & state to search
emptySearchErrorText.name: ./rl/emptySearchErrorMsg

showClosed.fieldDescription: Check this to show close restaurants in result.
showClosed.name: ./rl/showClosed

enableHoursFromSunday.fieldDescription: Check this to display week start from Sunday to Saturday for Restaurant and Drive-Thru hours. (Default week start - Monday to Sunday)
enableHoursFromSunday.name: ./rl/enableHoursFromSunday

enableDriveHours.fieldDescription: Check this to display Drive-Thru hours.
enableDriveHours.name: ./rl/enableDriveHours

enableFestiveHours.fieldDescription: Check this to display Festive hours.
enableFestiveHours.name: ./rl/enableFestiveHours

enableFamilyEvents.fieldDescription: Check this to enable Family Events and hours.
enableFamilyEvents.name: ./rl/enableFamilyEvents

showJobSection.fieldDescription: Check this to show career/job application section
showJobSection.name: ./rl/showJobSection

isApplyForJob.fieldDescription: Check this to display only Apply for job
isApplyForJob.name: ./rl/isApplyForJob

oLText.defaultValue: This restaurant is owned and operated by McDonald’s Restaurants of {statecode}, Inc
oLText.emptyText: This restaurant is owned and operated by McDonald’s Restaurants of {statecode}, Inc
oLText.name: ./rl/oLText

oFText.emptyText: This restaurant is owned and operated by an independent franchisee
oFText.name: ./rl/oFText

enable.fieldDescription: Check this to enable search widget in Header
enable.name: ./searchwidget/enabled

searchpagepath.fieldDescription: Please provide Search Detail Page path
searchpagepath.name: ./searchwidget/searchpagepath

pagetitle.fieldDescription: Enter the title for search link in header
pagetitle.name: ./searchwidget/title

placeholder.fieldDescription: Enter text to be displayed in search box as water mark.
placeholder.name: ./searchwidget/placeholder

submitButtonText.fieldDescription: Enter text to display on button for Search
submitButtonText.name: ./searchwidget/searchbuttontext

enable.fieldDescription: Check this to display disclaimer for cookie policy.
enable.name: ./cookiedisclaimer/enableCookieMsg

fontColor.fieldDescription: Please specify the Text color for cookie disclaimer
fontColor.name: ./cookiedisclaimer/cookieFontColor

bgColor.fieldDescription: Please specify the background color for cookie disclaimer
bgColor.name: ./cookiedisclaimer/cookieBgColor

accept.fieldDescription: Please specify the text for the Accept button.
accept.name: ./cookiedisclaimer/cookieButtonText

acceptFont.fieldDescription: Please specify the text color for the Accept button text.
acceptFont.name: ./cookiedisclaimer/buttonTextFontColor

acceptButtonColor.fieldDescription: Please specify the color for Accept button.
acceptButtonColor.name: ./cookiedisclaimer/buttonColor

disableConfig.fieldDescription:
Check this checkbox if you want to disable the SSO configuration JSON (that will disable the SSO functionality).
With the JSON config disabled, don't include any SSO/Profile components on the site, as they will not work properly.
If you disable JSON config, Login/Logout links will automatically be hidden as well.
disableConfig.name: ./sso/disableConfig

redirectNotLoggedInUserPath.fieldDescription: Path to the page (or fully qualified URL) where user should be redirected when they are not logged in and are trying to access components reserved for logged in users.
redirectNotLoggedInUserPath.fieldLabel: Page to redirect not logged in user
redirectNotLoggedInUserPath.name: ./sso/redirectNotLoggedInUserPath

whyLinkText.fieldDescription:
The 'Why?' link shows up inside or next to a form field and upon click shows additional information (configured by an author for that form field).
Please note that the 'Why?' link text cannot contain spaces. If there are any, they will be removed.
whyLinkText.name: ./sso/whyLinkText

backLinkText.fieldDescription: The 'Back' link shows up on various components when there are multiple views.
backLinkText.name: ./sso/backLinkText

errorGeneric.fieldDescription: Generic error message to show if web service returns error and no specific error message is found.
errorGeneric.name: ./sso/errorGeneric

userRegistered.fieldDescription: Message to show to the user after successful completion of the registration form.
userRegistered.name: ./sso/userRegistered

userRegisteredNeedsVerification.fieldDescription:
Message to show to the user after successful completion of the registration form, when email verification is needed.
You can use the {{email}} placeholder in the text. That placeholder will be replaced with the user's email address.
userRegisteredNeedsVerification.name: ./sso/userRegisteredNeedsVerification

passwordReset.fieldDescription: Message to show to the user after successful password reset.
passwordReset.name: ./sso/passwordReset

userLoggedIn.fieldDescription: Message to show to the user after successful login.
userLoggedIn.name: ./sso/userLoggedIn

userLoggedOut.fieldDescription: Message to show to the user after successful logout.
userLoggedOut.name: ./sso/userLoggedOut

accountVerified.fieldDescription: Message to show to the user after successful account verification.
accountVerified.name: ./sso/accountVerified

accountAlreadyVerified.fieldDescription: Message to show to the user after account verification, when their account had already been verified.
accountAlreadyVerified.name: ./sso/accountAlreadyVerified

verificationEmailSent.fieldDescription:
Message to show to the user that account verification email was sent.
You can use the {{email}} placeholder in the text. That placeholder will be replaced with the user's email address.
verificationEmailSent.name: ./sso/verificationEmailSent

verificationNeeded.fieldDescription:
Message to show to the user that account verification is needed.
This notification is a CTA to send another verification email.
verificationNeeded.name: ./sso/verificationNeeded

verificationCodeExpired.fieldDescription:
Message to show to the user trying to verify their account that verification failed (because of expired code or code not matching).
This notification is a CTA to send another verification email.
verificationCodeExpired.name: ./sso/verificationCodeExpired

accountDeleted.fieldDescription: Message to show to the user that their account was deleted.
accountDeleted.name: ./sso/accountDeleted

emailUpdatedNeedsVerification.fieldDescription:
Message to show to the user that their email address was updated but it needs verification.
You can use the {{email}} placeholder in the text. That placeholder will be replaced with the user's email address.
emailUpdatedNeedsVerification.name: ./sso/emailUpdatedNeedsVerification

userSubscribed.fieldDescription: Message to show to the user that they have subscribed to the newsletter.
userSubscribed.name: ./sso/userSubscribed

userUnsubscribed.fieldDescription: Message to show to the user that they have unsubscribed from the newsletter.
userUnsubscribed.name: ./sso/userUnsubscribed

socialLoginFailed.fieldDescription: Message to show to the user that social login failed.
socialLoginFailed.name: ./sso/socialLoginFailed

userLoggedOutBySystem.fieldDescription: Message to show to the user when they have been logged out by the system.
userLoggedOutBySystem.fieldLabel: User logged out by the system
userLoggedOutBySystem.name: ./sso/userLoggedOutBySystem

accountUpdatedPersonalInformation.fieldDescription: Message to show to the user that their personal information has been updated.
accountUpdatedPersonalInformation.name: ./sso/accountUpdatedPersonalInformation

accountUpdatedCommunicationPreferences.fieldDescription: Message to show to the user that their communication preferences have been updated.
accountUpdatedCommunicationPreferences.name: ./sso/accountUpdatedCommunicationPreferences

hideLinks.fieldDescription: Check this checkbox if you want to hide the Login/Logout links from the header.
hideLinks.name: ./sso/hideLinks

loginPagePath.fieldDescription: Path (or fully qualified URL) to the page containing the login form.
loginPagePath.name: ./sso/loginPagePath

PrivacyAndTCUpdate.title: Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions Update

privacyPolicyUpdateFormTitle.fieldDescription: Form title for Privacy Policy Update.
privacyPolicyUpdateFormTitle.name: ./sso/privacyPolicyUpdateFormTitle

privacyPolicyUpdateFormSubTitle.fieldDescription: Form subtitle for Privacy Policy Update.
privacyPolicyUpdateFormSubTitle.name: ./sso/privacyPolicyUpdateFormSubTitle

privacyPolicyLinkTitle.fieldDescription: Title of the Privacy Policy link.
privacyPolicyLinkTitle.name: ./sso/privacyPolicyLinkTitle

privacyPolicyPagePath.fieldDescription: Path (or fully qualified URL) to the Privacy Policy page.
privacyPolicyPagePath.name: ./sso/privacyPolicyPagePath

currentPrivacyPolicyVersion.fieldDescription: Version of the current Privacy Policy.
currentPrivacyPolicyVersion.name: ./sso/currentPrivacyPolicyVersion

privacyNote.fieldDescription:
This checkbox will be shown to the user if he has to update Privacy Policy only.
The label for 'Privacy Policy' checkbox can include a {{privacy}} placeholder that will be replaced with the Privacy Policy link.
E.g.: I agree to the {{privacy}}.
privacyNote.name: ./sso/privacyNote

termsAndConditionsUpdateFormTitle.fieldDescription: Form title for Terms & Conditions Update.
termsAndConditionsUpdateFormTitle.name: ./sso/termsAndConditionsUpdateFormTitle

termsAndConditionsUpdateFormSubTitle.fieldDescription: Form subtitle for Terms & Conditions Update.
termsAndConditionsUpdateFormSubTitle.name: ./sso/termsAndConditionsUpdateFormSubTitle

termsAndConditionsLinkTitle.fieldDescription: Title of the Terms & Conditions link.
termsAndConditionsLinkTitle.name: ./sso/termsAndConditionsLinkTitle

termsAndConditionsPagePath.fieldDescription: Path (or fully qualified URL) to the Terms & Conditions page.
termsAndConditionsPagePath.name: ./sso/termsAndConditionsPagePath

currentTermsAndConditionsVersion.fieldDescription: Version of the current Terms & Conditions.
currentTermsAndConditionsVersion.name: ./sso/currentTermsAndConditionsVersion

termsNote.fieldDescription:
This checkbox will be shown to the user if he has to update Terms & Conditions only.
The label for 'Terms & Conditions' checkbox can include a {{terms}} placeholder that will be replaced with the Terms & Conditions link.
E.g.: I agree to the {{terms}}.
termsNote.name: ./sso/termsNote

combinationUpdateFormTitle.emptyText: NEW TERMS AND CONDITIONS AND PRIVACY POLICY
combinationUpdateFormTitle.fieldDescription: Form title for Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions update.
combinationUpdateFormTitle.fieldLabel: Privacy Policy and Terms & Condition Update form title
combinationUpdateFormTitle.name: ./sso/combinationUpdateFormTitle

combinationUpdateFormSubTitle.fieldDescription: Form subtitle for Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions Update.
combinationUpdateFormSubTitle.fieldLabel: Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions Update form subtitle
combinationUpdateFormSubTitle.name: ./sso/combinationUpdateFormSubTitle

combinedNote.fieldDescription:
This checkbox will be shown to the user if he has to update both Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions.
The label for 'Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions' combined checkbox can include {{privacy}} and {{terms}} placeholders that will be replaced with the Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions links respectively.
E.g.: By clicking 'Submit' you agree to our {{privacy}} and {{terms}}.
combinedNote.name: ./sso/combinedNote
